8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah narrated:"The Messenger of Allah would fasting during the beginning of every month for three days, and Friday was the least of the days that he did not fast

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَوْمِ يَوْمِ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Fasting On Friday
